mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_MEMBER_LIST(ID, POSITION, MEMBER_ID, STUDY_GROUP_ID) VALUES (GROUP_MEMBER_LIST_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '팀장', #{id}, STUDY_GROUP_ID_SEQ.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT GML.ID ID, GML.POSITION POSITION, M.NAME NAME, M.AGE, M.GENDER, GML.STUDY_GROUP_ID STUDYGROUPID, M.ID MEMBERID FROM GROUP_MEMBER_LIST GML JOIN MEMBER M ON GML.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE GML.STUDY_GROUP_ID = #{studyGroupId} AND M.STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY GML.POSITION DESC, M.NAME

mapper.select: SELECT GML.ID ID, GML.POSITION POSTITION, GML.MEMBER_ID MEMBERID, GML.STUDY_GROUP_ID STUDYGROUPID, SG.NAME NAME, SG.TOTAL_COUNT TOTALCOUNT, SG.CURRENT_COUNT CURRENTCOUNT, SG.SUBJECT SUBJECT, SG.IMAGE_PATH IMAGEPATH, SGG.NAME SIGUNGUNAME FROM GROUP_MEMBER_LIST GML JOIN STUDY_GROUP SG ON GML.STUDY_GROUP_ID = SG.ID JOIN SI_GUN_GU SGG ON SG.SI_GUN_GU_ID = SGG.ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND SG.STATUS = 'enabled'
